params.about_text: This is MANISH KUMAR MAURYA. I have my completed my MCA from DR. RAM MANOHAR LOHIA AWADH UNIVERSITY FAIZABAD, UTTAR PRADESH. I have also a knowledge of Language - PHP, PYTHON, DJANGO, FLASK (these are web application framework.) And falimilier with UI(HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, BOOTSTRAP) AND MYSQL, ORACLE.
